bonus_count: The number of employee retention bonuses issued in Q1 2023. This reflects the company's strategy to retain key talent in a competitive EV industry.
total_bonus_amount: The total monetary value of the employee retention bonuses issued in Q1 2023. This indicates the financial commitment to employee retention.
average_bonus_amount: The average amount of each retention bonus issued. This provides insight into the standard bonus amount offered to employees.
quarter: The fiscal quarter during which the bonuses were issued, providing a temporal context for the data.
year: The fiscal year in which the bonuses were issued, providing a broader temporal context for trend analysis.
